entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming east 30 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
